alp: Ranked by its country name alphabetically, e.g. #1 Afghanistan, #194 Zimbabwe
pop: How many people in a country, e.g. #1 China, #194 Nauru
area: Size of a country, e.g. #1 Russia, #194 Monaco
den: Population / Area of a country, e.g. #1 Monaco, #194 Mongolia
gdp: Gross Domestic Product of a country, e.g. #1 USA, #194 Tuvalu
gdpc: Gross Domestic Product / Population of a country, e.g. #1 Liechtenstein, #194 Somalia
alpc: Ranked by its capital city alphabetically, e.g. #1 United Arab Emirates (Abu Dhabi), #194 Croatia (Zagreb)
latt: Position of the capital from the North pole southwards, e.g. #1 Iceland, #194 Tuvalu
long: Position of the capital from the anti/180th meridian (opposite of the prime meridian) eastwards, e.g. #1 Tonga, #194 Tuvalu
